languages.text: "А многие — правдивыми. Я — проповедник радикального учения, отрицающего страх. Я покинул пределы благословенного Империума, чтобы нести Его свет во тьму фронтира. Я по себе познал грех и теперь способен узнать его в любом обличье. Думаю, я могу позволить себе немного правды".

traits.locale_text: "А многие — правдивыми. Я — проповедник радикального учения, отрицающего страх. Я покинул пределы благословенного Империума, чтобы нести Его свет во тьму фронтира. Я по себе познал грех и теперь способен узнать его в любом обличьи. Думаю, я могу позволить себе немного правды".

languages.text: "And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know depravity first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."
languages.original_text: "А многие — правдивыми. Я — проповедник радикального учения, отрицающего страх. Я покинул пределы благословенного Империума, чтобы нести Его свет во тьму фронтира. Я по себе познал грех и теперь способен узнать его в любом обличье. Думаю, я могу позволить себе немного правды".

traits.locale_text: "And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know sin firsthand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

"And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know sin firsthand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

"And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know sin first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

"And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know sin first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

"And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know depravity first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

languages.text: “但也会有很多人认为我说的是真的。我是一位激进的布道士，已经不知恐惧为何物。我离开了帝国受祝福的边疆，带着祂的明光，来到了黑暗之中。我已经亲身体会过了堕落。现在，无论罪恶如何伪装，我都能察觉得到。我想，我可以接受适度的真相。”
languages.original_text: "And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know depravity first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

traits.locale_text: “但也会有很多人认为我说的是真的。我是一位激进的布道士，已经不知恐惧为何物。我离开了帝国受祝福的边疆，带着祂的明光，来到了黑暗之中。我已经亲身体会过了罪恶。现在，无论罪恶如何伪装，我都能察觉得到。我想，我可以接受适度的真相。”

languages.text: «Y muchos otros los considerarían verídicos. Predico unas enseñanzas radicales que reniegan del miedo. Me liberé del sagrado Imperium para traer Su luz a la oscuridad de la frontera. He conocido la depravación de primera mano y ahora sé percibirla, adopte la forma que adopte. Creo que puedo permitirme un ápice de verdad».
languages.original_text: "And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know depravity first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

traits.locale_text: «Y muchos otros los considerarían verídicos. Predico unas enseñanzas radicales que reniegan del miedo. Me liberé del sagrado Imperium para traer Su luz a la oscuridad de la frontera. He conocido el pecado de primera mano y ahora sé percibirlo, adopte la forma que adopte. Creo que puedo permitirme un ápice de verdad».

languages.text: 「反対に、私に同意するものも大勢いるでしょう。私は恐れを放棄する急進的な教義の伝道者です。私は辺境の『闇の中の灯火』を運ぶために、祝福されし帝国の枠を飛び出しました。堕落を身をもって知り、今では罪がどのような姿で現れようと、見抜くことができるようになりました。ある程度、真実を語る資格はあるかと思います」
languages.original_text: "And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know depravity first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

traits.locale_text: 「反対に、私に同意するものも大勢いるでしょう。私は恐れを放棄する急進的な教義の伝道者です。私は辺境の“闇の中の灯火”を運ぶために、祝福されし帝国の枠を飛び出しました。罪を身をもって知り、今では罪がどのような姿で現れようと、見抜くことができるようになりました。ある程度、真実を語る資格はあるかと思います」

languages.text: "Und viele andere würden sie als wahr betrachten. Ich bin Prediger eines radikalen Ansatzes, der der Furcht abschwört. Ich habe die Grenzen des gesegneten Imperiums hinter mir gelassen, um Sein Licht in die Dunkelheit des Grenzgebiets zu tragen. Ich habe die Sittenlosigkeit aus erster Hand erfahren und erkenne sie nun in jeder Verkleidung. Ich denke, ich kann mir ein wenig Wahrheit leisten."
languages.original_text: "And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know depravity first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

traits.locale_text: "Und viele andere würden sie als wahr betrachten. Ich bin Prediger eines radikalen Ansatzes, der der Furcht abschwört. Ich habe die Grenzen des gesegneten Imperiums hinter mir gelassen, um Sein Licht in die Dunkelheit des Grenzgebiets zu tragen. Ich habe die Sünde aus erster Hand kennengelernt und erkenne sie nun in jeder Verkleidung. Ich denke, ich kann mir ein wenig Wahrheit leisten."

languages.text: « Et tant d'autres n'y verraient que la vérité. Je prêche un enseignement radical qui rejette la peur. J'ai quitté le confort béni de l'Imperium pour porter Sa lumière dans les ténèbres de la frontière. J'ai une expérience directe de la dépravation, ce qui me permet de le détecter sous toutes ses formes. Je crois que je peux m'autoriser une once de vérité. »
languages.original_text: "And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know depravity first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

traits.locale_text: « Et tant d'autres n'y verraient que la vérité. Je prêche un enseignement radical qui rejette la peur. J'ai quitté le confort béni de l'Imperium pour porter Sa lumière dans les ténèbres de la frontière. J'ai une expérience directe du péché, ce qui me permet de le détecter sous toutes ses formes. Je crois que je peux m'autoriser une once de vérité. »

languages.text: "Birçokları da sözlerimde haklılık payı bulurdu. Ben korkuyu reddeden, radikal bir öğretinin vaiziyim. Kutsal İmparatorluk'un sınırlarından ayrılarak O'nun ışığını uzak diyarların karanlığına yaymayı seçtim. Ahlaksızlığı bizzat deneyimledim, hangi kisveye bürünürse bürünsün onu tanımayı öğrendim. Bence kendime bir nebze hakikati çok görmemeliyim."
languages.original_text: "And many others would find them truthful. I am a preacher of a radical teaching that renounces fear. I've left the bounds of the blessed Imperium to carry His light into the darkness of the frontier. I've come to know depravity first-hand and am now able to perceive it under any guise. I think I can afford myself a modicum of truth."

traits.locale_text: "Birçokları da bunları gerçek olarak alır. Ben korkuyu reddeden, radikal bir öğretinin vaiziyim. Kutsal İmparatorluk'un sınırlarından ayrılarak O'nun ışığını uzak diyarların karanlığına yaymayı seçtim. Ahlaksızlığı birinci elden deneyimledim ve onu nasıl bir maske takarsa taksın tanımayı öğrendim. Bence kendime bir miktar hakikati çok görmemeliyim."
